    • Constructor Detail

      • SimulatedAnnealing

        public SimulatedAnnealing(LinearProblem pb,
                          int nbIteration,
                          int failureThreshold,
                          double acceptationThreshold)
        Parameters:
        pb - : problem given to the Simulated Annealing
        nbIteration - : the numbers of iteration processed at each tier
        failureThreshold - : the number of times we allow the Simulated Annealing not to respect the acceptationThreshold
        acceptationThreshold - : the minimum proportion of new solutions expected from each tier of the simulated annealing for it to keep being productive

    • Method Detail

      • solve

        public void solve()
        This the main algorithm of the Simulated Annealing, which processes everything. At the end, it displays the solution, and the associated cost.

      • processTier

        public void processTier()
        This is a subFunction of the Simulated Annealing, that processes one tier.

      • refusBoltzman

        public boolean refusBoltzman(double cost,
                             double newCost)
        Parameters:
        cost - : cost of the last accepted solution
        newCost - : cost of the neighbor solution
        Returns:
        : returns true if the neighbor solution is accepted It uses the Boltzman probability to chose wether or not to throw away a solution

      • initTemp

        public abstract void initTemp()
        Will set the initial temperature of the Simulated Annealing

      • changeTemp

        public abstract void changeTemp()
        Will express how to change the temperature from one tier to another

      • generateNeighbor

        public abstract Solution generateNeighbor()
        Returns:
        : the new solution Will contain the algorithm that produces new solutions

      • initSol

        public abstract Solution initSol()
        Returns:
        : an initial solution of the problem
